title: CALCULATOR OF THE COST OF ABSENTEEISM
message: Through our Absenteeism Cost Calculator you will know the direct cost of absenteeism from your company, just by entering the data that we request below.
messageContingency: Indicate whether it is a professional downturn or not
messageCalculation: If the calculation is for a specific person or for a group of workers
messageSalary: Indicate if your company pays supplements in case of withdrawal
totalCost: TOTAL COST for the company XXXX â‚¬
